storageLimitation.title: Storage Limitation
storageLimitation.description: Donâ€™t store personal data you do not need anymore.

purposeLimitation.title: Purpose Limitation
purposeLimitation.description: Personal data should be collected for a specific and lawful purpose.

dataAccuracy.title: Data Accuracy
dataAccuracy.description: Information should be accurate, up-to-date, and kept for a limited time, ensuring accuracy.

lawfulness.title: Lawfulness
lawfulness.description: Information should be processed legally and ethically while upholding justice.

dataMinimization.title: Data Minimization
dataMinimization.description: Personal data should be minimal and be the exact amount of data that is needed.

fairnessAccountability.title: Fairness and Accountability
fairnessAccountability.description: Process personal data with fairness and accountability, adhering to privacy principles.

confidentialitySecurity.title: Confidentiality and Security
confidentialitySecurity.description: Entities must safeguard individuals' data, uphold their rights, and implement measures for data integrity.
